title: Exorcist meets the book from evil dead
review: First 2 hours are aerie, spooky, creepy, dramatic and you even go like 'well this could be real'Then the ending kicks in (we will call this the LETS KILL THE BOOK part) and you goOMG WHY?The whole movie vibe, gone in seconds. You go from 'I might get nightmares to I can't stop laughing'
